title: Hoshina - DaAn
description: 穗科, at 台北市忠孝東路四段216巷27弄3號, is a noodle house with a few locations. The owner learned udon making from a Japanese master. Menu is vegan friendly. Egg is used in the cold udon, and the menu specifies which items are lacto-veg and ovo-veg. Known for in-house-made udon noodle, both hot and cold. Also serves side dishes and desserts.
streetAddress: 3, Alley 27, Lane 216, Sec. 4, Zhongxiao East Rd, Da-An District
